trans-unit.source: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.
trans-unit.target: 實作按鈕控制項通用的基本功能。

trans-unit.source: You do not typically inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: 您通常不會從繼承<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>。

trans-unit.source: To create your own button class, inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立您自己按鈕的類別，繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>，或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>類別。

trans-unit.source: To have the derived button control display an image, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property or the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示影像的衍生的按鈕控制項，請設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>屬性或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The image can be aligned on the button control by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 映像可以藉由設定對齊按鈕控制項上<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageAlign%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, to align the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A> displayed on the button control, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，若要對齊<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Text%2A>顯示按鈕控制項上，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property determines the style and appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性決定的樣式和控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.System?displayProperty=nameWithType>，使用者的作業系統決定控制項的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出省略字元 (...) 是否會顯示在控制項的右邊緣，表示控制項文字超過控制項的指定長度。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果要以省略符號表示還有其他標籤文字，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoEllipsis%2A> to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the control when the user passes over the control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoEllipsis%2A>至`true`來顯示文字超出控制項的寬度，當使用者通過的控制項的滑鼠時。

trans-unit.source: You must set the control's `AutoSize` property to `false` if you want <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoEllipsis%2A> to be `true`.
trans-unit.target: 您必須設定控制項的`AutoSize`屬性`false`如果您想<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoEllipsis%2A>是`true`。

trans-unit.source: If `AutoSize` is `true`, the control will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear.
trans-unit.target: 如果`AutoSize`是`true`控制項將會成長以容納文字，不會出現省略符號。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control resizes based on its contents.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否根據其內容調整大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control automatically resizes based on its contents; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項根據其內容自動調整大小則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSize" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSize" /> 屬性的值變更時。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>, such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>。

trans-unit.source: Then name the instance `ButtonBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSizeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 然後將其命名執行個體`ButtonBase1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.AutoSizeChanged>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> value representing the background color.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> 值，表示背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new accessibility object for the control.
trans-unit.target: 為控制項建立新的協助工具物件。

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the required creation parameters when the control handle is created.
trans-unit.target: 建立控制代碼時，取得必要的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" /> that contains the required creation parameters when the handle to the control is created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams" />，包含建立控制項之控制代碼時所需的建立參數。

trans-unit.source: for operating with unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 用於與 unmanaged 程式碼的作業。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Gets the default Input Method Editor (IME) mode supported by this control.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個控制項所支援的預設輸入法 (IME) 模式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: As implemented in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase> class, this property always returns the `Disable` value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在中實作<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>類別，這個屬性永遠傳回`Disable`值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImeMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the default size of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得控制項的預設大小。

trans-unit.source: The default <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的預設 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源，<see langword="false" /> 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 釋放 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase" /> 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase>參考。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關如何實作<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the appearance of the border and the colors used to indicate check state and mouse state.
trans-unit.target: 取得框線的外觀以及用來表示核取狀態和滑鼠狀態的色彩。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatButtonAppearance" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatButtonAppearance" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatAppearance%2A> property only with <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> controls whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatAppearance%2A>屬性只能搭配<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>控制其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle.Flat>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按鈕控制項的平面樣式外觀。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="Standard" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="Standard" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> classes is set to `System`, the control is drawn by the user's operating system and the check alignment is based upon the `CheckAlign` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> property values.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>類別設為`System`、 繪製控制項的使用者的作業系統和核取對齊根據`CheckAlign`和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The `CheckAlign` property value is not changed, but the appearance of the control can be affected.
trans-unit.target: `CheckAlign`不會變更屬性值，但控制項的外觀可能會受到影響。

trans-unit.source: The check box is horizontally aligned with either the left or right edge of the control (a left or center alignment appears left aligned, right remains unchanged), and vertically aligned the same as the descriptive text.
trans-unit.target: 核取方塊水平對齊的控制項 （左或置中對齊顯示左邊的對齊，以滑鼠右鍵會保持不變），向左或右邊緣和以垂直方式對齊的描述性文字相同。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control with a `CheckAlign` property value of `ContentAlignment`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>用來控制`CheckAlign`屬性值為`ContentAlignment`。

trans-unit.source: `MiddleCenter`, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A> property value of `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property value is set to `System`, the check box alignment will appear to be `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` while the text alignment remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: `MiddleCenter`<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.TextAlign%2A>屬性值為`ContentAlignment.TopRight`，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性值設定為`System`，核取方塊對齊方式將會出現`ContentAlignment.TopLeft`維持不變的文字對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`，指派給任何映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>屬性不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> and sets some of its common properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>並設定一些常見的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right.
trans-unit.target: 結果會是左的文字和影像右側的一般按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace is included.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄，而且參考<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會包含命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的自訂大小區域。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: 擷取可容納控制項之矩形區域的大小。

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> 類型的排序配對，代表矩形的寬度與高度。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.GetPreferredSize%2A> differs by control.
trans-unit.target: 行為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.GetPreferredSize%2A>不同的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A> might be unable to assign the returned size to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LayoutEngine%2A>可能無法傳回的大小指派給控制項。

trans-unit.source: You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases.
trans-unit.target: 您可以傳回的大小大於中指出的條件約束`proposedSize`參數，但`proposedSize`應該降低為條件約束則會減少。

trans-unit.source: For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，`GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))`不能大於`GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`。

trans-unit.source: The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.
trans-unit.target: 例外狀況是`proposedSize`為 0 或`Size.Empty`，這會定義為非限制。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a button control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按鈕控制項上顯示的影像。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> displayed on the button control.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕控制項上所顯示的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property will be set to `null`, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property will be set to its default, -1.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>屬性將設定為`null`，而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>屬性會設定為其預設值為-1。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A> property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property are not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.FlatStyle%2A>屬性設定為`FlatStyle.System`，指派給任何映像<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>屬性不會顯示。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> and sets some of its common properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>並設定一些常見的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right.
trans-unit.target: 結果會是左的文字和影像右側的一般按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace is included.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄，而且參考<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會包含命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the image on the button control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按鈕控制項上影像的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="MiddleCenter" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="MiddleCenter" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> and sets some of its common properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>並設定一些常見的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right.
trans-unit.target: 結果會是左的文字和影像右側的一般按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace is included.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄，而且參考<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會包含命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按鈕控制項所顯示影像的影像清單索引值。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based index, which represents the image position in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />.
trans-unit.target: 以零起始的索引，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" /> 中的影像位置。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 -1。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> properties are set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property is set to its default value, `null`.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>設定的屬性，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>屬性設為預設值， `null`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property value is changed to `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property returns its default value, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>屬性值變更為`null`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>屬性會傳回其預設值為-1。

trans-unit.source: However, the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> value is retained internally and used when another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> object is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，受指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>值是保留在內部，使用時，另一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>物件指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property value is adjusted to one less than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>屬性具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值小於或等於指派給的值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>減去 1 （以帳戶為集合的以零為起始的索引） 的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>屬性值會調整為其中一個小於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: For example, consider a button control whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> has three images and whose <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property is set to 2.
trans-unit.target: 例如，請考慮按鈕控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>有三個映像和其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>屬性設為 2。

trans-unit.source: If a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> that has only two images is assigned to the button, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> value changes to 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>只有兩個映像具有指派給按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>值變更為 1。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>並設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> has been created and a minimum of one <xref:System.Drawing.Image> has been assigned to it.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>已經建立而且至少有一個<xref:System.Drawing.Image>已指派給它。

trans-unit.source: This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼也需要您具有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄。

trans-unit.target: 所指派的值小於 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex" /> 的下限。

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property is set, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A> property is set `null`, which is its default value.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>設定屬性，則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.Image%2A>屬性設定`null`，這是預設值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property value is changed to `null`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property returns its default value, -1.

trans-unit.source: However, the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> value is retained internally and used when another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> is assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 不過，受指派<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>值是保留在內部，使用時，另一個<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If the new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList> assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A> property has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property minus one (because the collection is a zero-based index), the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A> property value is adjusted to one less than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList>指派給<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageList%2A>屬性具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性值小於或等於指派給的值，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>減一的屬性 （因為集合是以零為起始的索引），則<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.ImageIndex%2A>屬性值會調整為其中一個小於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ImageList.ImageCollection.Count%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button control is the default button.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出按鈕控制項是否為預設按鈕。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the button control is the default button; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鈕控制項為預設按鈕，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.IsDefault%2A> property is set to `true`, the button is the default button for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.IsDefault%2A>屬性設定為`true`，按鈕是預設按鈕<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>。

trans-unit.source: This means that the button is clicked when the ENTER key is pressed if no other button or any other control that captures the ENTER key has focus.
trans-unit.target: 這表示如果沒有其他按鈕已按下 ENTER 鍵或 ENTER 鍵可擷取的其他任何控制項有焦點時按下按鈕。

trans-unit.source: To specify the default button of a form, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A> property of the form to the desired button.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定表單的預設按鈕，設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.AcceptButton%2A>表單屬性以所需的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnGotFocus%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnGotFocus%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnGotFocus(System.EventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: Do not call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> method when you override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> in a derived class).
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>按鈕已停用 (這包括基底類別的呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>方法，當您覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>衍生類別中)。

trans-unit.source: When disabling the button in an override of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>, call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A> method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.
trans-unit.target: 停用的覆寫中的按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>，呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown%2A>方法，然後再停用 按鈕，或沒有完全呼叫它。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnKeyDown(System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: Do not call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A> if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A> method when you override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A> in a derived class).
trans-unit.target: 請勿呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A>按鈕已停用 (這包括基底類別的呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A>方法，當您覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A>衍生類別中)。

trans-unit.source: When disabling the button in an override of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A>, call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A> method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.
trans-unit.target: 停用的覆寫中的按鈕時<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A>，呼叫基底類別的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown%2A>方法，然後再停用 按鈕，或沒有完全呼叫它。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ButtonBase.OnMouseDown(System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs)" /> 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個控制項的相關文字。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 與這個控制項關聯的文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of the text on the button control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定按鈕控制項上文字的對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="MiddleCenter" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="MiddleCenter" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the derived class, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> and sets some of its common properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會使用衍生的類別，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button>並設定一些常見的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right.
trans-unit.target: 結果會是左的文字和影像右側的一般按鈕。

trans-unit.source: This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the <xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType> namespace is included.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼，您必須擁有名為點陣圖影像`MyBitMap.bmp`儲存在`C:\Graphics`目錄，而且參考<xref:System.Drawing?displayProperty=nameWithType>就會包含命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所指派的值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the position of text and image relative to each other.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字和影像彼此之間的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: One of the values of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation" /> 的其中一個值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation.Overlay" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation.Overlay" />。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 該值不是其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextImageRelation" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，決定要使用 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 還是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer" /> 類別 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 來呈現文字。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果<see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" />類別應該用來執行與 1.0 和 1.1 版的相容性的文字轉譯。

trans-unit.source: of the .NET Framework; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: .NET framework。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class.
trans-unit.target: `UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性為了提供 visual Windows Form 控制項之間的相容性呈現文字使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]應用程式，執行自訂文字轉譯使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下，如果您的應用程式未從升級[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，建議您保持`UseCompatibleTextRendering`設定的預設值為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>類別中引進了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]為了提升效能，讓文字看起來比較好，並改善的國際字型支援。

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class was used to perform all text rendering.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基礎<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別用來執行所有的文字轉譯。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 計算字元間距和自動換行以不同的方式從[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In a Windows Forms application that uses the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer> to appear different from the other text in the application.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Form 應用程式中使用<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>類別來呈現文字中，這可能會導致使用的控制項的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextRenderer>出現不同的應用程式中的其他文字。

trans-unit.source: To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control.
trans-unit.target: 若要解決此不相容，您可以設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`屬性`true`特定控制項。

trans-unit.source: To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with a parameter of `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定`UseCompatibleTextRendering`至`true`應用程式中所有支援的控制項，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.SetCompatibleTextRenderingDefault%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>具有參數的方法`true`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否將前面加上連字號 (&) 的第一個字元當做控制項的助憶鍵來使用。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the first character that is preceded by an ampersand (&) is used as the mnemonic key of the control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果第一個字元前面加上連字號 (&) 是用做為控制項的助憶鍵的索引鍵，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines if the background is drawn using visual styles, if supported.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，以便判斷背景是否使用視覺化樣式所繪製 (如果支援)。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the background is drawn using visual styles; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果背景是使用視覺化樣式所繪製，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Visual styles are specifications for the appearance of controls.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化樣式，則控制項的外觀的規格。

trans-unit.source: For example, visual styles can define the color, size, and font of controls, and they enable you to configure the visual interface to coordinate with your application interface.
trans-unit.target: 例如，視覺化樣式可以定義色彩、 大小和控制項的字型，而且可以讓您設定視覺化介面，以便與您的應用程式介面協調。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, they provide a mechanism for all Windows-based applications to have visual styles applied.
trans-unit.target: 此外，它們會提供所有的 Windows 架構應用程式，將套用的視覺化樣式的機制。

trans-unit.source: The Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" /> to process.
trans-unit.target: 要處理的 Windows <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Message" />。

trans-unit.source: Processes Windows messages.
trans-unit.target: 處理 Windows 訊息。
